mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, reviewNo, reviewTitle, reviewDesc, reviewRegDate , reviewModDate FROM (select * from review WHERE reviewTitle LIKE '%'||#{keywordTitle}||'%' AND reviewDesc LIKE '%'||#{keywordDesc}||'%' AND itemNo=0 order by reviewNo desc)) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-#{sizePerPage}+1 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page}
SELECT count(reviewNo) FROM review WHERE reviewTitle LIKE '%'||#{keywordTitle}||'%' AND reviewDesc LIKE '%'||#{keywordDesc}||'%' AND itemNo=0

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum,username, reviewNo, reviewTitle, reviewDesc, reviewRegDate , reviewModDate FROM (select * from review WHERE itemNo=#{itemNo} order by reviewNo desc) ORDER BY reviewNo asc) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{sizePerPage}*#{page}-9 and #{sizePerPage}*#{page} ORDER BY reviewNo DESC
SELECT reviewPic FROM review WHERE reviewNo = #{reviewNo}
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM review WHERE itemno=0 ORDER BY reviewno DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
